column4: #xchat is quiet, I will ask here until a response... is there a way for me to delete the Xchat config file and hope Xchat makes a new one, or manually edit it?  the problem is that I probably messed up xchat while editing the config (and enabling window transparency)
most apps create new config files if you delete the old one
would you hapen to know the name and location of the Xchat app?
